messages.message:
Quick check in on the Cypress tests running on sandbox, because a lot of them are breaking and there's too much noise right now for us to catch things. Let's drop everything and get these fixed today:

• @Udit file-list and results-table
• @Weiming Wu drives
• @Travis version-history
• @Xindi Xu workspaces-drives-crud (I know we may not be able to fix this one yet, wanted to include it in the list anyways)
I've seen a couple other flaky tests (like mine, workspaces-create-dashboard), so if you've been pinged recently please take a look and see what happened and if it can be hardened at all :pray:

`workspaces-drives-crud` and `drives` can't be fixed now because of backend search service instability  (probably the same for `drives`):

We have to create an index job when mounting/unmounting drives but the search service is down sometimes so this is broken. https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C011FHLBN8N/p1723068352919609, https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C011FHLBN8N/p1723140882270109

file-list and results-table is an easy fix im doing right now.

want me to skip those 2 you mentioned above for ci? @Xindi Xu
It's not blocking merging so no need to skip CI
ah you already added the non blocking tag, cool
Version history was an out of sync app on sandbox, fixed it.
Can I get a review on this https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/61698

Thank you for the quick fixes!!

@Xindi Xu do you think we should skip the drive tests completely right now if we know they're not going to pass?
I think it's better to include it in CI because I know that @Travis and @Liam Callanan are working on related UI. @Travis, @Liam Callanan if you don't think this is helpful, we can skip
